name: wrmi
description:
Because of @aliendovecote / porpentine.itch.io's #petjam

Just a worm kind of thing you can play with. Unlike many (virtual) pets, it doesn't need to be fed and it won't die. It's just here for you to enjoy :)

Instructions

  • Start it windowed so you can keep Wrmi in the background and say hello anytime.
  • Click to interact.
  • Alt-ESC for fullscreen.
  • ESC to quit.

Stick of butter mode: press 'b' (because of Necla).
